DOC.brief_summary: This study will include 60 patients with early breast cancer referred to receive adjuvant chemotherapy with AC ( adriamycin- cyclophosphamide) or CAF ( adriamycin- cyclophosphamide- 5- fluorouracil ) combinations. These patients will receive every day one spoon of Lifemel honey or regular honey ( double blind)- during the adjuvant chemotherapy .Every week a WBC count will be performed in order to record the influence of Lifemel on myelotoxicity.
DOC.brief_title: Lifemel Honey to Reduce Leucopenia During Chemotherapy
DOC.criteria: breast cancer patient treated with adjuvant chemotherapy PS = 2 or less
